channel.title: Neuro-X Revision 640
channel.description:
[center][img]http://neuro-x.org/logo.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Developers: Emperia, JavaGuru (Not on this site) & `Luke (Also not on this site)[/b]
[b]~ The Forums ~[/b] [url=http://neuro-x.org/]http://neuro-x.org/[/url] ^ If this is not allowed please remove the link ^
[b]~ Skills ~[/b] Green = Complete Yellow = In Progress Red = Not Started
Woodcutting Firemaking Mining Smithing Thieving (Stalls need to be done) Fishing Cooking Summoning (More familiars to be done) Hunter Runecrafting Herblore Dungeoneering Slayer Farming Agility Trainable Prayer Crafting Fletching Construction
[b]~ Media ~[/b] [img]http://neuro-x.org/nximages/ScreenShot067.png[/img] [img]http://neuro-x.org/nximages/ScreenShot070.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zKGrG.png[/img]
~ Quests ~ Cooks Assistant Dragon Slayer Power of Jas (Pt 1.) Power of Jas (Pt 2.) Power of Jas (Pt 3.) Power of Jas (Pt 4.) Power of Jas, 4 Quest Series Info: [url=http://neuro-x.org/index.php/topic/20-power-of-jas-4-quest-series-spoiler]http://neuro-x.org/index.php/topic/20-power-of-jas-4-quest-series-spoiler[/url]
[b]~ Interactive Areas ~ [/b] Edgeville Dungeon (Training spot) Varrock, Lumbridge, Falador, Al Kharid & Home (For their shops (exactly like runescape)) MageBank (Pking)
[b]~ Update Log (AS OF TODAY) ~[/b] [code]Update: Dialogue manager done npc faces and defaces correctly on convo end and start, even if the players walks away in a convo the npc will deface and the convo will end.[/code]
Neuro-X Home Location is Llteya The Alpha release will be around 15-25th Dec & will always be economic.
If anyone can dump current rs packets + deob the current client for me it'd be greatly appreciated.
[/center]

item.title: Neuro-X Revision 640

@austin_cadle wrote:

Good luck and dont stop

~ Update Log (AS OF TODAY) ~

Update: Dialogue manager done npc faces and defaces correctly on convo end and start, even if the players walks away in a convo the npc will deface and the convo will end.

Neuro-X Home Location is Llteya
The Alpha release will be around 15-25th Dec & will always be economic.

If anyone can dump current rs packets + deob the current client for me it’d be greatly appreciated.
